description:
Captain Hitsugaya`s advance troops remain in Karakura Town to prepare for the showdown with Sosuke Aizen. Rangiku is fascinated by life in the world of the living, and she finds it impossible to devote her time to training. During the shopping spree of a lifetime, Rangiku`s Soul Phone alerts her of a Hollow appearance. Leaving her boy-crazy gigai behind, Rangiku arrives at the coordinates to intercept the Hollow.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le cauchemar Arrancar ! L`équipe Hitsugaya entre en jeu
Nightmare Arrancar! Team Hitsugaya Moves Out
悪夢のアランカル! 日番谷隊出撃
